# mgc_object_storage_buckets (Data Source)

Retrieves a list of all object storage bucket names.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "mgc_object_storage_buckets" "buckets" {
}

output "buckets" {
  value = data.mgc_object_storage_buckets.buckets
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `buckets` (List of String) List of bucket names.
